snippet: Eddie Redmayne, one of the stars of "Les Miz," talks about learning to sing without contorting his face into "something that would make an audience throw up."
abstract: Eddie Redmayne, one of the stars of "Les Miz," talks about learning to sing without contorting his face into "something that would make an audience throw up."

headline.main: Eddie Redmayne and His Singing Face
